content.question: Which of the following best describes the cellular process illustrated in Figure 1 ?

choices.label: Sister chromatids separating during anaphase of mitosis
Chromosomes lining up along the midline of the cell during mitosis
Reducing the chromosome number during anaphase <math alttext="1" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi></math> of meiosis
Chromatids failing to separate during meiosis

content.answer: Reducing the chromosome number during anaphase <math alttext="1" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi></math> of meiosis

skill.text: 2.A: Describe characteristics of visual representations of biological concepts and processes.
